## Import from Excel
### Tidy Excel files
```{r}
rawdata <- read_excel('data/Medtest_e.xlsx')
rawdata <- rename(rawdata,
                  `Size (cm)`=size,
                  `Weight (kg)`=weight) |> 
  select(-Sex_m)
saveRDS(rawdata,file = "data/rawdata.rds")
```
